entry.title: I am applying for a PhD, if you are interested, please contact me
entry.content:
I am currently pursuing a Master’s degree in the Institute of Machine Intelligence at University of Shanghai for Science and Technology, under the guidance of Assoc. Prof. Song Tang.

Information

Email: suwenxin43@gmail.com
Research Interests: Transfer Learning; Computer Vision; Machine Learning;
Google Scholar: https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=BPQ9bSwAAAAJ

Education and Professional

  • University of Shanghai for Science and Technology (USST), China, 2022.09 - Present

    • M.S., Biomedical Engineering
    • Advisor: Assoc. Prof. Song Tang
    • GPA:89.05/100

  • Chengdu Aosailixing Information Technology Service Co., Ltd., China, 2021.03 – 2022.04

    • Data Analyst
    • Topic: Build machine learning models to analyze data

  • Halmstad University, Sweden, 2018.09 – 2019.02

    • Exchange Student, Computer Science
    • GPA:3.5/5

  • Chengdu Jincheng College, China, 2017.09 – 2021.06

    • Bachelor Student, Internet of Things Engineering
    • GPA:3.8/5 (Core GPA: 4.0/5)

Publications

[1]Song Tang, Wenxin Su, Mao Ye, and Xiatian Zhu. Source-free domain adaptation with frozen multimodal foundation model. In Proceedings of the IEEE/CVF Conference on Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition (CVPR) 2024.
[2]Song Tang, Wenxin Su, Yan Yang, Lijuan Chen, and Mao Ye. Model adaptation via credible local context representation. CAAI Transactions on Intelligence Technology.2023. (IF: 6.867)
[3]Song Tang, Wenxin Su, Mao Ye, Jianwei Zhang and Xiatian Zhu. Unified source-free domain adaptation. arXiv: 2403.07601.2024 Submitted to IEEE Transactions on Pattern Analysis and Machine Intelligence [Under Review]

Academic Experience

  • During the M.S. at USST, 2022.04 – Present
    • Research on source-free domain adaptation of object recognition
  • During the Exchange Student at Halmstad University 2018.09 – 2019.02
    • Research on computer network structure.

Research Project

Designed and implemented a unified source-free framework project based on PyTorch: https://github.com/tntek/source-free-domain-adaptation

Selected Honor & Awards

Frist Prize Scholarship at University of Shanghai for Science and Technology

  • Top 5% Mar, 2024

National Scholarship for Postgraduates

  • Top 1% Sep, 2023

Excellent Student of Chengdu Jincheng College

  • Top 1% May, 2021

Second Prize Scholarship at Chengdu Jincheng College

  • Top 20% Sep, 2019

Skills and Hobbies

  • Programming and others: Python, PyTorch, C, R, Data Visualization, Latex, Kettle, MySQL
  • Hobbies: Hiking, Runing, Cycling, Basketball
entry.summary: I am currently pursuing a Master’s degree in the Institute of Machine Intelligence at University of Shanghai for Science and Technology,
